price: Follow what is revealed to you from your Lord. Indeed, Allah is All-Aware of what you do.
arabic: وَٱتَّبِعۡ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
